long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Prodivy measures how much time you spend on different websites so that you can improve your productivity when working. Features include:

1. Automatic monitoring of websites you use, including Jira, Gmail, Slack, and more.
2. Ability to generate reports by day, week, month and year of your total time spent.
3. Secure and private - pause tracking and easily download and delete your data.
